rules_text: Exile X instant and/ or sorcery cards from graveyards. For each card exiled this way, create a copy of it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Morgan's Tome Collection.
flavor_text: [i]“The future? I hardly remember anything, so I'm not sure what to say. I certainly don't remember the impending doom and despair Lucina speaks of. ...It's hard to believe that's how the world will turn out...”[/i]
